file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bsim3_681.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bsim4_681.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)

  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_681_SON/bsim3_681.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bsim3_681.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bsim3_681.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_681_SON/bsim3_681.cir.prn )

endif()

endif()
